overview:
Taj Ahmad Eldridge is currently partners with Ahmir Gibran in a Private Equity management fund.

Taj formerly served as Chief Economist for TRW Investments. He began his career as a Commercial Banker with Wells Fargoâ€™s U.S. Corporate Banking Division in 1997, managing institutional treasury relationships.

In 2006, Taj joined UBS as an Investment Manager in their Beverly Hills office. Most recently, Taj was Partner & Economist for Global PolicyVentures,LLP, venture debt firm, where he served on the board of agencies such as Textopoly & invested in start-ups such as , NewYooStyle, rookielook, & The Ivy League Early Learning Academy.

Taj is a member of the Arab Bankers Association of North America (ABANA) , supporter of Hedge Fund Cares nonprofit organization and is a graduate of Texas A&M University-Commerce (BA), Pepperdine University (MBA) and Claremont Graduate Universityâ€™s School of Politics & Economics (PhD studies). Taj has also completed post graduate work at the Hong Kong University of Science & Technology, University of Porto-Portugal & Universidad Adolfo Ibanez-Santiago, Chile as well as lectured on various international investment topics at Chapman University, University of California-Riverside and conferences such as the Intracultural Vintners Association, EMEA Venture Capital conference. Taj is fluent in Spanish and Arabic.
